languages.text: Until the start of the next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} the target gains 50 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and 1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} until the end of combat.
languages.original_text: До начала следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} цель получает +50 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g} и 1 уровень {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}утомления{/g} до конца боя.

traits.locale_text: Until the start of next turn every time target recieves any damage it gains 10 temporary wounds .
Until the start of the next turn, every time the target receives any damage it gains 10 temporary wounds.
Until the start of the next turn, every time the target receives any damage it gains 10 temporary wounds.

Until the start of the next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} the target gains 50 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and 1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} until the end of combat.

languages.text: До начала следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} цель получает +50 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g} и 1 уровень {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}утомления{/g} до конца боя.
languages.original_text: Until the start of the next turn, every time the target receives any damage it gains 10 temporary wounds.

traits.locale_text: До начала следующего хода, получая любой урон, цель также получает 10 временного здоровья.
До начала следующего хода, получая любой урон, цель также получает 10 временного здоровья.

languages.text: 在下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始之前，每当目标受到任何伤害时，都会获得50点{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}与1层{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲劳{/g}状态，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: Until the start of the next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} the target gains 50 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and 1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 在下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始之前，每当目标受到任何伤害时，都会获得10点{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}。

languages.text: Hasta el principio del siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, el objetivo gana 50 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g} y 1 acumulación de {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigado{/g} hasta el final del combate.
languages.original_text: Until the start of the next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} the target gains 50 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and 1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Hasta el principio del siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, cada vez que el objetivo sufre daño gana 10 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g}.

languages.text: 次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始まで、ターゲットは50の{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時的な負傷耐性{/g}と、戦闘終了まで蓄積数1の{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲労{/g}を付与される。
languages.original_text: Until the start of the next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} the target gains 50 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and 1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始まで、ターゲットが何らかのダメージを受ける度、{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}を10得る。

languages.text: Bis zum Start des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} erhält das Ziel 50 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g} und 1 Stapel {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Erschöpft{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes.
languages.original_text: Until the start of the next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} the target gains 50 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and 1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Bis zum Start des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} erleidet das Ziel 10 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g}, wenn es Schaden hinnimmt.

languages.text: Jusqu'au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant, la cible bénéficie de 50 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g} et de 1 cumul de {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Fatigue{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text: Until the start of the next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} the target gains 50 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and 1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Jusqu'au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant, chaque fois que la cible subit des dégâts, elle bénéficie de 10 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g}.

languages.text: Hedef, 50 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}geçici sağlık{/g} puanı kazanır ve 1 {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}yorgunluk{/g} birikimi elde eder. Geçici sağlık puanları bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turun{/g} başına dek, yorgunluk birikimi ise çatışma sonuna dek kalır.
languages.original_text: Until the start of the next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} the target gains 50 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and 1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} until the end of combat.
